name: Miasmal Dread
book: Pathfinder Campaign Setting: Inner Sea Races © 2015, Paizo Publishing, LLC
text: A cloud of sickly green mist pours from your mouth and coalesces around creatures in the cone. Attempt a single Intimidate check to demoralize as part of casting the spell, comparing the result against the DC to Intimidate each foe within the area. You demoralize all foes whose DC you meet or exceed.
text_zh: 你进行一次DC为法术DC的威吓检定以挫败区域内所有目标的士气。
